title: Best of The Program | Guest: Rep. Karen Whitsett | 4/13/20
description:
In today’s coronavirus update, all 50 states are under disaster declarations for the first time in U.S. history, there is no free market any more as the Federal Reserve buys up loads of debt, and we could face rolling lockdowns for 18 months. Is democracy the main victim of COVID-19? Michigan Rep. Karen Whitsett thanks President Trump and hydroxychloroquine for her COVID-19 recovery. She joins to call for partisan unity as her state desperately needs more resources and her governor’s draconian orders cause mass confusion. Glenn responds to a listener’s email: Was Rep. Thomas Massie right to stand up against Congress’ refusal to vote in person on the $2 trillion stimulus bill?
